<JD_START>
Job Title: Armis/OT Engineer

Location: Abbott, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Description 

Hands on Armis experience. From ordering, to decommissioning an Armis appliance along with all required steps. Work with various manufacturing sites, understand how to rack and mount Armis appliances. -Will create better visibility into OT data and what actions needed to be taken. Optimize end to end, gain more visibility and work with the network team to see what is missing. -Ability to troubleshoot Armis appliances as they go down. This person needs to be able to help with RMA process, sending off a new collector and or replacing broken hardware structures. -Armis has been deployed across all 90 sites and they need help with properly configuring Armis across those sites to help give full visibility in OT data. We are not looking for a consultant here, needs to be a hands on Armis/OT Engineer that able to configure devices and optimize from end to end for full visibility. -Experience with end to end Armis configuration. -Experience creating dashboards to monitor and send OT data back to the sites to be able to monitor and take action. -Understand overall Armis deployment model, maintenance and support and how to optimize.


 Skills 

Armis, Cyber security, OT, Security architecture, Information security, Network security, Firewall

 Top Skills Details 

Armis,Cyber security,OT,Security architecture

 Additional Skills & Qualifications 

NA

 Experience Level 

Expert Level

 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
